entry.title: Introducing BTCPay Vault â€“ use any hardware wallet with BTCPay and its full node
entry.summary: In laymen words, BTCPay Vault is a separate app, locally hosted on your own PC, which BTCPay Server connects to and asks for permission. Once permission is granted, BTCPay is able to integrate with any hardware wallet connected to your PC.
